channel.title: Projects on Mario Paul
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Mario Paul

item.title: Project 2: Software Engineer Salary Estimator Tool
item.description: ● Developed a web application for software engineers to get a general idea of how much they can potentially make in the United States with their level of knowledge. ● Scraped over 1000 job descriptions from Glassdoor using Python and Selenium. ● Engineered features in the application to allow customization by the user to select options that reflect their value and experience for more personalized results. ● Deployed model using Streamlit.

item.title: Project 1: Penn State Post-Grad Salary Analysis
item.description: Due to COVID-19, many college graduates across the United States have unfortunately experienced a hard time searching for Full-Time opportunities in the job market. This analysis was done with the vision of providing graduates of The Pennsylvania State University Donald P. Bellisario College of Communications an up to date analysis of what locations are currently offering the most jobs and best salaries for each position. With this analysis, graduates and rising seniors can obtain an idealistic view of what each position entails, an average salary of across the country, in various locations which can be useful when negotiating salaries:
